phrases: I am Gouda Takeo, a first-year in high school.
For the very first time in my life,
a girl I like actually likes me back.
Um, it is the first time I have seen you on the morning train.
Do you always take this one?
Maybe I will switch to this one, then.
But this would be cutting it close.
It is nice to be on the same train,
but I should not be late to class, right?
That couple there is pretty amazing.
No way, they must be father and daughter.
But that man's in a school uniform.
We will pick up where we left off yesterday, on page 24.
I already got to see a good show today.
I would have gone for a first kiss right there and then.
He was so cool, I could not resist taking a video.
It was a limited express, right?
Takeo must have gone all the way to the final stop.
But why did she pick Gouda-kun?
Is this a Koizumi Girls' Academy uniform?
Is this a Koizumi Girls' Academy uniform?
Is this a Koizumi Girls' Academy uniform?
I did not know it was possible to take such nice videos.
My boy fell into the river!
Well, I did not do anything.
I do not know how to thank you.
I am running late to my date!
You are drenched, but it is not raining.
On his way here, he saved a drowning boy.
I only handed the boy to his mom.
He is the one who jumped in.
I have a towel, but it is hardly big enough.
You should have gone home to change.
I did not want to keep you waiting.
You could have called or texted her.
I have been thinking that, too.
call or text you, even when there is no real reason.
Today, I made a roll cake.
A friend asked me to make some for her,
but I am not sure how good it is.
This one has whole strawberries in it,
And they bake you cakes, even when it is not your birthday.
and I tried adding banana to the batter for this one!
You always say everything's delicious, Takeo-kun!
It is such a small thing,
but she laughs like hearing it makes her really happy.
I already got rid of it.
She is the total opposite of my mom,
who was once an amateur wrestler.
Make sure you wash that before you return it.
That was subtle, giving us a moment alone.
Takeo-kun, do you want to go through the park?
You get a really great view of the stars!
It is dark, so you can see them really well.
There is not anyone around here, huh?
It is just the two of us...
Until you are all grown up,
I will not touch a single hair on your head!
I will do everything in my power to treat her right.
Yeah, I took the afternoon bullet train.
There is a lot in there.
He is walking his girlfriend home.
You have got to be kidding me!
Do not tell me you had feelings for him.
Are you sure he is not being duped?
There is no way Takeo would get a girlfriend!
Not a big, lumbering gorilla like him!
So do you like him or hate him?
Are you sure he is not being used?
I have never seen two people genuinely in love before.
Only a woman would understand another woman's true nature!
It is impossible that any girl other than me would have feelings for him!
There is got to be something going on!
Takeo's still his lame self, is not he?
He still has his weird hairstyle, does not he?!
Do you really even actually like him?
To: Takeo-kun Subject: Um Um, Takeo-kun.
I have something I want to tell you...
I could not tell you this until now, but...
To: Takeo-kun Subject: Hello Takeo-kun, today was really fun.
When can I see you again?
Subject: Re: Hello I am free Wednesday.
Do not you think it is about time you stopped having me tag along?
Yamato seems like a very pure-hearted person.
When it is just the two of us, I think she gets nervous.
If you are there, she will be more relaxed.
No, she cannot be the one.
No, I have not been waiting at all
I heard you have a girlfriend.
so as a kid, I used to get nervous.
You do not get your homework?
at heart, she is a kind person.
What do you like about Takeo?
Hard to explain, but likes him just the same.
Maybe that is how it is.
Lately, I am really into icings,
so I used icing on langues de chat-type cookies.
Sounds like she is a girly girl.
She is a very nice person!
I am not a good person at all...
I mixed up the sugar and salt!
I like sweet things and super salty things.
Actually, is there anything you do not like?
Then what do you like about Yamato-san, Takeo?
but if I had to choose...
She is hiding something from Takeo.
She has not been totally honest about herself with Takeo.
Maybe she is two-timing him or having an affair.
She has something she does not want to tell him.
The stars look great today, too.
When she said she would fallen for Takeo at first sight, you should have known something was off.
She would not have fallen in love with him
unless she had a real reason to.
I bet she is hiding a big secret.
Hey, are you listening to me?
Your daughter has not been home for a while,
and you are already abusing her.
I am learning about how girls think.
I would thought that Yamato had feelings for Suna.
If Yamato will not tell me,
I will not have a clue.
If only she would tell me, I could help her.
It might be something she cannot tell you...
Something she cannot tell her boyfriend.
It could be that she is two-timing you, having an affair,
or that she is found someone else.
Even if that is the case, I will be fine.
It is more important to me that Yamato's in knots about it.
It might be easier for her to talk to another girl.
I did wonder if a guy reading that stuff might be creepy.
Did it help you figure anything out?
